content.text: On Mondays, at 8 o'clock in the morning, I attend English class to improve my language skills. At 10:30, I jump into the world of numbers with Math lessons. Tuesdays are dedicated to exploring the past, as I have my History class in the afternoons. On Wednesdays at a quarter past eleven, I embark on a journey across the globe, studying different countries in Geography class. Thursdays are my favorite days because I have music lessons in the evening. The end of the week is very fun because on Fridays we do science experiments that are always very interesting.
